details.description: Maitri Bagh is a popular zoo and park in Bhilai, housing various animals and offering a serene environment for visitors.
Deobalod is a scenic spot near Bhilai, known for its lush greenery and peaceful surroundings.
Dhamdha is a historic site with ancient ruins and temples, attracting history enthusiasts.
The Bambleshwari Temple atop a hill in Dongargarh is dedicated to Goddess Durga and offers scenic views.
Sirpur is an ancient town with archaeological sites reflecting Buddhist, Hindu, and Jain cultures.
Tandula Dam is a picturesque spot offering boating facilities and scenic views for visitors.
Chitrakoot Falls, known as the 'Niagara Falls of India,' offers breathtaking natural beauty.
